description: A customizable input component used to create time inputs.

properties.name: bordered
properties.description: Indicates that the input should have a border.

properties.name: customClass
properties.description: Custom CSS class to apply to the input.

properties.name: datalistOptions
properties.description: The options to display in the time input dropdown. Options must be in `HH:mm` or `HH:mm:ss` format.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether the form control is disabled.

properties.name: feedback
properties.description: Feedback to render below the input.

properties.name: inputId
properties.description: The ID of the input element.

properties.name: inputTabIndex
properties.description: Determine the control's relative ordering for sequential focus navigation (typically with the Tab key).

properties.name: datalistId
properties.description: ID of a `<datalist>` element that contains pre-defined time options. The value must be the ID of a `<datalist>` element in the same document.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The text to display within the label.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: required
properties.description: A value is required for the form to be submittable.

properties.name: showSeconds
properties.description: Displays the time input format as `HH:mm:ss` if `true`. Internally sets the `step` to 1 second. If a `step` value is provided, it will override this attribute.

properties.name: step
properties.description: Specifies the granularity that the `value` must adhere to. Value of step given in seconds. Default value is 60 seconds. Overrides the `seconds` attribute if both are provided.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the time input. Always in 24-hour format that includes leading zeros: `HH:mm` or `HH:mm:ss`, regardless of input format which is likely to be selected based on user's locale (or by the user agent). If time includes seconds the format is always `HH:mm:ss`.

events.name: inputBlur
events.description: Event emitted when the input loses focus.

events.name: inputChange
events.description: Event emitted when the input value changes.

events.name: inputFocus
events.description: Event emitted when the input gains focus.

scripts.title: Basic Usage
scripts.code: <modus-wc-time-input autoComplete="example-autoComplete" feedback="example-feedback" inputId="example-inputId" inputTabIndex="example-inputTabIndex" datalistId="example-datalistId" label="example-label" max="example-max" min="example-min" name="example-name" step="example-step"></modus-wc-time-input>
